# hw_fridge (Resource)

Fridge resource for sandwich shop. Required for hw_store. Cost varies by size.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `size` (String) Size of fridge (small=$300, medium=$500, large=$800)

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the fridge

### Read-Only

- `cost` (Number) Cost of the fridge in dollars
- `id` (String) Fridge identifier
